title: Microsoft Viva: Briefing email for Government Community Cloud
description:
The daily briefing email- a personalized, actionable briefing email from Microsoft Viva, automatically delivered to your Outlook inbox to help you start the day on track and stay on top of tasks, will be available for Government Community Cloud (GCC).
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/viva/insights/personal/briefing/be-overview
GA date: June CY2022
